help.title: HELP PANEL - DISCORDTOP.ORG BOT
help.bot:
`{0}robot infos` : Display bot infos
`{0}robot invite` : Get the invite link of the bot
`{0}ping` : Display bot latency
help.dt:
`{0}id` : Get the current server's id
`{0}vote` : Vote for the current server
`{0}boost` : Boost the current server
`{0}user [user]` : Display user's informations
`{0}server` : Display current server's informations
help.tops:
`{0}top` : Display the current Top 10
`{0}top FR` : Display the Top 10 of French Servers
`{0}top EN` : Display the Top 10 of English Servers

config.name: :tools: | **Configuration** (Owner only)
config.value:
`{0}config install` : Install the bot
`{0}config invite` : Create a new invite
`{0}config lang [lang]` : Select the language of your server

botinfos.description: A bot linked to [DiscordTop]({}), made to vote from Discord, display informations, and more !

botinvite.title: YOU WANT MORE VISIBILITY ? INVITE ME !

perms.name: Discord Permissions required
perms.value:
{0} Create Invite
{0} Read Messages
{0} Send Messages
{0} Manage Message
{0} Embed Links
{0} Attach Files
{0} Use External Emojis

config.owner: :x: **Only the server's owner is allowed to use this command**

invite.fail:
**Invite modification failed : I don't have the Create Instant Invite permission.
Execute the `{}config invite` command after adding the permission.**

lang.error: Your server's language is already set to `{}`

user.id_error: :x: **Error : Please enter a valid id or a valid mention (or nothing)**
user.bot_error: :x: **This user is a bot... He don't have a DiscordTop account.**
user.account_error: :x: **This user don't have a DiscordTop account**
user.author: Requested by {}
